name: HMD Ivalo XE
highlights:
Exp. release 2025, Q4

Android
256GB storage, Unspecified

BODY.Build: Glass front (Gorilla Glass Victus 2), aluminum frame (6000 series), glass-fiber back
BODY:
IP68/IP69K dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.8m for 30 min)
MIL-STD-810H compliant

DISPLAY: *Exact display resolution is not officially revealed

PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (1x2.9 GHz Kryo Gold Prime & 3x2.7 GHz Kryo Gold & 4x2.0 GHz Kryo Silver)

MAIN CAMERA.Features: Laser AF, LED flash, HDR, panorama

COMMS.USB: USB Type-C, OTG, accessory connector pins

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (side-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer
FEATURES:
Desktop connection support
Dual FBE and FDE encryption
CBRS, eMBMS, PPDR support
Meets FIPS 140-3 (CSFC) and NIAP security standards
Radio hardware kill-switch
AReX anti-tampering
Fusion 3.1 modularity system
Developed and manufactured in Europe
